statements: UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET scan_result = 'abnormal' WHERE participant_id = 101
UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET eye_movement_pattern = 'erratic', scan_result = 'normal' WHERE participant_id = 102
UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET scan_result = 'Normal' WHERE participant_id = 100 AND scan_timestamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00';
UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET eye_movement_pattern = 'Irregular' WHERE scan_result != 'Normal';
UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET y_coordinate = 15, x_coordinate = 20 WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE EyeMovementPatterns SET pattern_description = 'Horizontal movement pattern', average_movement_speed = 3.2 WHERE pattern_id = 5;
UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET x_coordinate = 50, y_coordinate = 75 WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE EyeMovementPatterns SET pattern_description = 'Unstable pattern', average_movement_speed = 3.5 WHERE pattern_id = 3;
UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET x_coordinate = 100 WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE EyeMovementPatterns SET pattern_count = pattern_count + 1 WHERE participant_id = 2;
UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET x_coordinate = 100, y_coordinate = 200 WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE EyeMovementPatterns SET pattern_description = 'New Description', pattern_count = 10 WHERE participant_id = 1 AND pattern_id = 2;
UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET eye_movement_pattern = 'Smooth' WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE StudyParticipants SET participant_gender = 'Female' WHERE participant_id = 2;
UPDATE RetinaScanningData SET eye_movement_pattern = 'Pattern A' WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE StudyParticipants SET participant_gender = 'Female' WHERE participant_id = 2;
UPDATE Retina_Scanning_Participants SET age = 30, participant_name = 'John Smith' WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE Retina_Scanning_Sessions SET session_date = '2022-10-15', duration_minutes = 45 WHERE participant_id = 2;
UPDATE Retina_Scanning_Participants SET age = age + 1, gender = 'Female' WHERE participant_id = 1;
UPDATE Retina_Scanning_Sessions SET duration_minutes = 45, participant_id = 2 WHERE session_date = '2022-07-15';
